channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Road breaking up around manhole cover, 11th February
item.description:
There is large chunks of tarmac across the road from an increasing large and deep hole next to a man hole cover which is in danger of collapsing. It is also an increased risk of causing a road traffic accident.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Porcupine Close, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavements and road edges need weeding along Talfourd road., 11th February
item.description:
Pavements and road edges need weeding along Talfourd road. The location is all along Talfourd rd on the pavements and road edges. The last time this was done was in 2025. Thank you in advance
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 31, Talfourd Road, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Autumn leaves need clearing along Talfourd Road., 11th February
item.description:
Please clear all Autumn leaves from along Talfourd Road and off the pavements. It was partially cleared on two occasions in 2025 but due to the lack of care in this area and on this street leaves are still present and soddened causing mess and safety issues. The exact location can not be exact, the entire street needs sweeping and cleaning. The issue has been present since Autumn (October 2025). Thank you in advance.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 31, Talfourd Road, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The glass in shelter fell out, 11th February
item.description:
A pane of glass fell out of the shelter and narrowly missed an elderly man. Some teenagers stood the glass up against the shelter. This pane of glass is very sharp and not very visible, and will cause a danger to passers by

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 349, Ballards Lane, North Finchley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Damage - smashed glass or panels / jagged metal edges on shelter

item.title: Huge pothole, 11th February
item.description:
Very large pothole in the road that is releasing debris. This debris could be flicked out and injured pedestrians or vehicles. The whole is so big also that vehicles could be damaged by falling into the hole.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gospatrick Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pretty vicious pothole near bus stop Trafalgar Estate T, 11th February
item.description:
This pothole is deep and has very steep sides. It would be horrific to cycle into, and it's all the worse because it's exactly where cyclists ride, so they would have to swerve into the path of passing vehicles to avoid it. I don't know how long it's been here. It's located in the bus stop road marking for the bus stop called Trafalgar Estate T, located on Trafalgar Road, close to the junction with Park Row.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Trafalgar Road, Greenwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree dangerous, 11th February
item.description:
Tree has overgrown I’ve tried talking to the landlord he won’t do nothing, large branches have fallen into my garden when my children play and my dog plays out there. I’ve now do not let my children play outside the back garden and I take my dog out the front side because I’m worried about the large branch that keep falling off.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 97, Nuxley Road, Upper Belvedere, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large sheet of glass abandoned in bin, 11th February
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Clapton Terrace, Hackney, London

item.title: The leaves in the street and the gutters is so full that when it rains the road is flooding and it’s impossible to get to the other side of the car. Can someone please come and sweep the street and clear the leaves from the autumn. It is now February!, 11th February
item.description:
The drains are blocked with leaves in the whole of our street and when it rains the road gets semi flooded. The curbs are full of water.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cranbourne Gardens, Temple Fortune, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping behind grey lockers, 11th February
item.description:
There is a large amount of fly tipping behind the grey lockers in St George's car park. These items have been there since before Christmas and leaving them results in other items being left. Please arrange for a proper clean and removal of all items behind the locker. Thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Albemarle Road, Beckenham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
